titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for adiourning the terme.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: And by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at his Maiesties court at Wansted, the ninth day of September, 1630. in the sixt yeere of his Maiesties reigne ... .
Arms 21; Steele notation: infection dome 2) either 3) And contemning.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: And
